PipeOpSubsample

Source: R/PipeOpSubsample.R

Subsamples a Task to use a fraction of the rows. frac can be > 1 if replace is TRUE.

PipeOpSubsample

Format

R6Class object inheriting from PipeOpTaskPreproc.

Parameter Set

  • frac :: numeric(1)
    Fraction of rows in the task to keep. Default 1.

  • stratify :: logical(1)
    Should the subsamples be stratified by target? Default FALSE.

  • replace :: logical(1)
    Sample with replacement? Default is FALSE.

See also

Other PipeOps: PipeOpEnsemble, PipeOpTaskPreproc, PipeOp, mlr_pipeop_NULL, mlr_pipeop_backup_learner, mlr_pipeop_balancesample, mlr_pipeop_branch, mlr_pipeop_chunk, mlr_pipeop_copy, mlr_pipeop_encode, mlr_pipeop_featureunion, mlr_pipeop_filter, mlr_pipeop_impute, mlr_pipeop_learner, mlr_pipeop_majorityvote, mlr_pipeop_modelavg, mlr_pipeop_nloptmajorityvote, mlr_pipeop_pca, mlr_pipeop_scale, mlr_pipeop_unbranch, mlr_pipeops
